NIACL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 550 AO Health and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 11:19 IST
 New India Assurance Company Limited
 550 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 50,925 to 85,925




FOLLOW

The New India Assurance Company (NIACL) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 550 Legal Specialists, Risk Engineers, Automobile Engineers, Accounts Specialists, AO Health, IT specialists, Business Analysts, and Company Secretaries. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, MBBS, MD/ MS, BDS, MDS, BAMS, BHMS can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, like the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NIACL Recruitment 2025, are given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Maharashtra.

NIACL Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of vacancies	Quaification
Legal Specialists	50	Any Degree, Post-Graduation
Risk Engineer	50	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech
Automobile Engineer	75
Accounts Specialists	25	CA/ ICWAI
AO Health	50	MBBS, MD/ MS, BDS, MDS, BAMS, BHMS
IT Specialist	25	B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech
Business Analyst	75
Generalist	193	Post Graduation
Visit the official notification for more vacancy details and educational qualification

Age Limit for the NIACL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 30 years.
Age Relaxation is applicable as per norms.

Selection Process for the NIACL Recruitment 2025

Written Examination
Interview

Salary Structure for the NIACL Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 50,925 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 85,925 /- per month.

Application fee for the NIACL Recruitment 2025

For SC/ ST/ PwBD Candidates: Rs. 100 /-
For All Other General Candidates: Rs. 850 /-
How to Apply for the NIACL Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the AO Health Notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with an email and a password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and take a print of the application form for further refernce.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	07-08-2025
Last Date of Application	30-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
